page.title: 19BLO'NORTON HALL/USERS.
page.content: The Village Hall stands on{LAND donated by the lord of the Manor,and was funded initially by a loan of Â£150 from three residents, being repaid subsequently by the Hall Management Committee. It is a prefabricated building, somewhat in need of redecor- ation but providing the only secular {FOCAL POINT}in the village. It has a permanent stage, kitchen facilities, a bar and a lounge. To the rear there is a recreational area of land with some children's play apparatus. Perhaps due to the small, scattered nature of the village there are only a few communal{ORGANISATIONS. There is a W.I. founded 35 years ago, which meets monthly and gives aid to village activities, a Social Club and a keep fit class. There is an annual Harvest Supper & the hall is used for Council meetings during the summer.
